empty.title: Drag and drop a file here

samples.loadFailed: Failed to load: {error} (switched to built-in sample)

footer.localOnly: All data is computed and rendered locally. No uploads or data collection.

export.scaleTip: Additional export scaling based on the current view. To avoid excessive scaling errors, zoom in on the model with the mouse wheel first.
export.scaleCapped: Export scale was capped from {requested} to {used} (GPU limit: {limit}px).

inspect.title: Atom inspector
inspect.hint: Click an atom to inspect; enable measure mode to accumulate selections (up to 3).
inspect.orderHint: Computed in selection order: ∠(1–2–3) with point 2 as the vertex.

display.viewPresetsHint: Select 1 preset for single view, or select 2 presets for side-by-side dual view.
display.viewPresetsNeedOne: Please keep at least one view preset selected (cannot uncheck the last one).
display.dualViewHint: Render front and side views side-by-side.
display.dualViewSplitHint: Adjust the width ratio between front (left) and side (right) view.

autoRotate.speedHint: Speed is adjusted independently; the preset only defines the axis (direction).

diagXY.name: XY plane diagonal
diagXY.hint: Rotate around the diagonal direction in the XY plane

diagYZ.name: YZ plane diagonal
diagYZ.hint: Rotate around the diagonal direction in the YZ plane

diagXZ.name: XZ plane diagonal
diagXZ.hint: Rotate around the diagonal direction in the XZ plane

tilt.name: Tilted axis
tilt.hint: A slightly tilted axis that often looks good

lammps.alert: When a LAMMPS dump or LAMMPS data file provides only numeric types, specify the element symbol for each type here to ensure correct color/radius, bond inference, and stable rendering.
lammps.hint: Recommended dump fields: id, type, x y z. If per-frame ordering is not fixed, the parser will sort by id to avoid animation jitter.

files.openFileHint: You can also drag & drop a file onto the canvas. New loads are added as layers and previous layers are hidden by default.

layers.hint: Click a row to set the active layer; use the toggle to show/hide. Dragging a new model adds a layer and hides previous layers by default.

other.refreshBondsOnPlay: Refresh bonds each frame while playing
other.bondFactorHint: Used to infer bonds: cutoff = (r_i + r_j) × bondFactor. Larger values create bonds more easily.
other.sphereSegmentsHint: Higher values look smoother but are slower to render.

colors.alert: After editing colors, click “Refresh” to apply them to the model.
colors.invalidHex: Invalid color format. Please use #RRGGBB or #RGB.
colors.resetTooltip: Reset to the built-in default color of this element.
colors.hint: Tip: If the active layer has typeId (e.g. LAMMPS), colors are keyed as element+typeId (C1, C2, ...); otherwise they are keyed by element.
colors.empty: No editable atom types in the active layer.
